channel.title: [Rejected] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-CIS
channel.description:
The following addition to the [IATI Organisation identifier ](http://iatistandard.org/203/codelists/IATIOrganisationIdentifier/) list has been proposed for CARE International Foundation - Switzerland (registered in Sudan with the Humanitarian Aid Commission).
The [request was reviewed ](https://github.com/org-id/register/issues/305) by org-id.guide for the most appropriate identifier, and it was concluded that no alternative organisation identifier is currently available.
**Code:** XI-IATI-CIS **Name:** CARE International Foundation - Switzerland **Description:** Working on the humanitarian and live saving activities in Sudan **URL:** https://www.care.org/country/sudan
If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.

item.title: [Rejected] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-CIS
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
Hi Matt,

They could not use a Swiss identifier because CARE International Switzerland are not actually registered there, and mainly operate in Sudan.

The reg no. that you have provided is actually for CARE as a whole, so would not be suitable.

However, we have since found that CARE International Switzerland in Sudan have been provided an ID by UN OCHA (http://org-id.guide/list/XM-OCHA) so we will instead proceed with using the UN agency code instead.

Read full topic

item.title: [Rejected] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-CIS
item.dc:creator: matmaxgeds
item.description:
IATI-techteam:

CARE International Foundation - Switzerland

How come they don’t just use a Swiss org-id?

“The CARE International Secretariat which coordinates and supports the network to achieve our goals and shared global priorities is a Swiss Association (registration number CHE-357.762.646) with its registered office at 7-9 Chemin de Balexert, 1219 Châtelaine, Geneva, Switzerland.” from: https://www.care-international.org/privacy-policy

Read full topic

item.title: [Rejected] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-CIS
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The following addition to the IATI Organisation identifier list has been proposed for CARE International Foundation - Switzerland (registered in Sudan with the Humanitarian Aid Commission).

The request was reviewed by org-id.guide for the most appropriate identifier, and it was concluded that no alternative organisation identifier is currently available.

Code: XI-IATI-CIS
Name: CARE International Foundation - Switzerland
Description: Working on the humanitarian and live saving activities in Sudan
URL: https://www.care.org/country/sudan

If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.
